What is JAVA ? 

* Fully fledged application language 
* Web programming language 
* Pure Object Oriented Program
* NOT Radical 
* looks from C++ behaviour from Smalltalk
* When compiled, it creates a bytecode which means it can be compiled -
- anywhere which supports Java (JVMs which are installed in any processor)

* Refer the buzzwords to understand the specifics of Java 

* Object program is also called byte-code program generated by the java 

***** REFER CURRENT NOTE AND LECTURE NOTE FOR THEORY *******
